chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:
The phone hasn't arrived. It says it's been delivered and it hasn't been delivered to anyone, not even my neighbor.
Thank you,

Hi ecomobile,

I hope you're doing well!

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

I hope you're doing well!

Our customer has reported that he already has the mobile phone, thank you very much for your help.

Thank you!

Regards,
Adriana from the Back Care Team
